meanings.definition: An organism that generates heat to maintain its body temperature.
meanings.sent1: The endotherm kept itself warm by producing heat internally.
meanings.sent2: The endotherm's ability to generate heat helps it stay at a constant temperature.
meanings.sent3: The endotherm was like a little heater, always cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The endotherm's internal furnace kept it toasty even on the coldest days.
meanings.sent5: The endotherm's self-made warmth was like a comforting blanket.

meanings.sent1: The endotherm's warm blood allowed it to thrive in various climates.
meanings.sent2: An endotherm can regulate its body temperature regardless of the external conditions.
meanings.sent3: The endotherm's warm blood made it the envy of all the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The endotherm's warm-blooded nature kept it active even in the cold.
meanings.sent5: The endotherm's warm blood was like a constant source of energy.

meanings.definition: A creature that regulates its body temperature internally.
meanings.sent1: The endotherm adjusts its body temperature without needing external help.
meanings.sent2: Endotherms have a unique ability to control their own warmth.
meanings.sent3: The endotherm was like a little temperature wizard, always in control.
meanings.sent4: The endotherm's internal thermostat kept it comfortable in any environment.
meanings.sent5: The endotherm's self-regulating system was a marvel of nature.
